synonyms: lakṣmī-gaṇa—the goddesses of fortune; tāṅra—Her; vaibhava-vilāsa—as vaibhava-vilāsa; aṁśa—of plenary portions; rūpa—having the form; mahiṣī-gaṇa—the queens; vaibhava-prakāśa—of vaibhava-prakāśa; svarūpa—having the nature.
translation: The goddesses of fortune are Her plenary portions, and they display the forms of vaibhava-vilāsa. The queens are of the nature of Her vaibhava-prakāśa.
